text: The 2022 Monkeypox outbreak in the United States is part of the bigger outbreak of human Monkeypox caused by the Monkeypox virus. == Cases by State == Based from the CDC map of the United States. This data is updated by the CDC Mondays-Fridays. Cases of monkeypox State Case(s) 1 51 6 7 16 5 6 2 26 3 12 2 1 1 35 1 1 2 1 2 1 7 3 2 4 Total cases 201 As of June 24, 2022 at 2:00pm Eastern Time == Related pages == * 2022 monkeypox outbreak * Monkeypox virus == References == Category:United States-related lists Category:Diseases caused by bacteria monkeypox
title: 2022 Monkeypox outbreak in the United States
